SummaryEnglish:
Since the era changed from Edo to Meiji, Japan has been changing rapidly with the current government's policy of modernization. Kyoto where Expo was being held.
The government issued licenses to monsters that lived with humans. There was a company that arrested unregistered monsters to keep the peace. The name of the company is "Kido Shinsengumi Co. Ltd."
Meanwhile, a young guy came back to Kyoto from Shanghai with his monster buddy, Nekomaru. He was Sakamoto Ryunosuke, the son of Sakamoto Ryoma.

4.TitleEnglish: Resurrection! The Capital of a Hundred Demons!

1.SummaryEnglish: Yuuko runs into trouble when she and Miki Saotome of the Tsubame Group go after the same unlicensed Monster.

2.SummaryEnglish: A large dept sets the Mobile Shinsengumi into motion to find a way to pay it off.

3.TitleEnglish: The Skin is Dyed in the Cloud of Steam
3.SummaryEnglish: Yuuko tries to set up Sazaku and Ryuunosuke. Meanwhile Gennai convinces Nekomata to participate in an experiment.

4.TitleEnglish: How Play Time Leads to Fighting and Rumors
4.SummaryEnglish: Yuuko, Toshie, and Kaoru are teaching Ryuunosuke about the wonders of women - and then he meets Koyuki.

5.SummaryEnglish: Miki and Ukon summon a monster to kill Ryuunosuke. Gennai’s creation - a mechanical marionette of Toshie's mother - goes berserk!

6.TitleEnglish: True Colors of Okita!? Ryunosuke, Details of his Love!?
6.SummaryEnglish: Yuuko wants a handsome celebrity to flirt with Sazaku to make Ryuunosuke jealous - but the star has other interests.

7.TitleEnglish: Praying to the Gods to Find the Whereabouts of Love
7.SummaryEnglish: Even though it will hurt her heart, Kaoru uses a Goddess to make Sazaku and Ryuunosuke fall in love.

8.SummaryEnglish: Nekomata revives Ryuunosuke when he dies - but she gives him a girl’s soul!

9.TitleEnglish: The Feelings for One`s Mother Are Reflected in the Moon
9.SummaryEnglish: The Mobile Shinsengumi is after a monster that disguises itself as a candy man to steal the spirits of children.

10.TitleEnglish: How Losing One`s Way Leads to Sorrow
10.SummaryEnglish: When the Mobile Shinsengumi investigates a rash of Monster disappearances, they find themselves facing the Tsubame Group once more.

11.TitleEnglish: Hello From the Countries of the World
11.SummaryEnglish: Ryuunosuke fiancé shows up and causes all kinds of trouble, but he may still have to marry her in order to pay off a debt!

12.TitleEnglish: Ghosts that Came from the Eastern Countries (Part One)
12.SummaryEnglish: Miki and Ukon meet a vampire. Meanwhile, Yuuko trys to keep Ryuunosuke and his fiancé from leaving.

13.TitleEnglish: Ghosts that Came from the Eastern Countries (Part Two)
13.SummaryEnglish: The vampire Montague kidnaps Ryuunosuke's fiancé to lure him into a trap.
